Statute.Title: Criminal Code (firearms) and the Firearms Act, An Act to amend the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Code criminel (armes à feu) et la Loi sur les armes à feu, Loi modifiant le)

Item.Text: — s. 8 repealed before coming into force see 2012, c. 1, s. 47, in force 06.11.2012 see SI/2012-48
— ss. 9(1) and (3), 13 to 21, 25, 36, 38 and 39, ss. 64(3), (4) and (7) of the Firearms Act, as enacted by s. 40(2), ss. 41, 42, 44 to 47, 54 and 56 in force 10.04.2005 see SI/2005-27(a), and
— pursuant to s. 193(1) of the Firearms Act, S.C. 1995, c. 39, par. 24(2)(c) of the Firearms Act, as enacted by s. 18, in force 10.04.2005 see SI/2005-27(b)
— ss. 26 to 35 and 37 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2014 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3 (Statutes Repeal Act), see also Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 149, No. 6, 07.02.2015, pp. 181-182

— ss. 64(5) and (6) of the Firearms Act, as enacted by s. 40(2) and s. 51 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2013 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3 (Statutes Repeal Act), see also Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 148, No. 9, 01.03.2014, p. 542

CIF.Text: CIF, 2019, c. 9 (assent: 21.06.2019), s. 23 to 30 in force on assent

Item.Text: — s. 29(3) of Ending the Long-gun Registry Act is deemed never to have been amended by 2015, c. 36, s. 230 see s. 23(1); subsections (4) to (7) repealed and deemed never to have come into force see s. 23(2)
— s. 30 of Ending the Long-gun Registry Act is repealed and deemed never to have come into force see s. 24
